textos_fuente.text: About | Empire Liquors Home About Our Products Premium Spirits Contact OUR STORY Excellence  & Empire Building Through Hard Work & Dedication Premium Partnership to build an Empire Meet the visionary founders of Empire Liquors – the dynamic duo, Bull and Shernett. Originating from the vibrant culture of Jamaica, their story is a compelling narrative of ambition, perseverance, and a unified dream to forge an exceptional legacy. What started with a singular restaurant concept has flourished into an expansive empire that stands as a testament to their hard work and dedication. Why Empire Liquors Stands Apart Their journey reached a pivotal moment when they acquired the entire plaza surrounding their initial restaurant, a strategic move that paved the way for the inception of Empire Lounge & Liquors. This expansion was not just a growth in space but a leap towards realizing their dream of creating a comprehensive, immersive experience for their patrons. Owning the plaza allowed Bull and Shernett to seamlessly integrate their offerings, setting the stage for Empire Liquors to source its own premium spirits. Committed to Our Community and Environment This innovative approach ensures that both the Empire Lounge and their affiliated restaurants serve unique, high-quality beverages that align with their standard of excellence. Empire Liquors stands as a beacon of their ambition, offering an exquisite selection of spirits that are as diverse and rich as the journey that led to their creation. Under Bull and Shernett's stewardship, Empire Liquors doesn't just sell spirits; it invites customers into a story of empire-building, where every bottle shares a piece of their dream turned reality. HOURS: Tuesday - 6 pm to 2 am Wednesday - 6 pm to 1 am Thursday - 6 pm to 3 am Friday - 8 pm to 3 am Saturday - 8 pm to 3 am Sunday - 6 pm to midnight CONTACT US: 561- 557-7845 3111 45th St Ste 14 & 15, West Palm Beach, FL 33407 © 2024 Empire Liquor Bar Powered by b.Digital Consulting

Menu Delivering Excellence Every Day About Portfolio Our Brands Our Suppliers Community Careers Let’s Socialize Contact Us Departments Newsletter Customers Policies & Announcements Order Online Customer Service New Customer Existing Customers Pay Online Pay Online Supplier Login Customer Login Close Menu Home >   About Empire Merchants North For immediate Assistance: (800) 724-3960 | info@empirenorth.com Synonymous with Service & Quality Empire Merchants North was formed in September 2007 from the merging of Colony Liquor & Wine Distributors and Service-Universal Distributors, two companies whose roots reach back to the end of Prohibition. The result is Upstate New York’s premier wine and spirits distributor, proudly building on decades of experience. With state-of-the-art facilities and a dedicated team of over 700 knowledgeable and well-equipped employees, Empire Merchants North has become synonymous with both service and quality, earning the loyalty of more than 9,000 restaurants, bars, hotels, nightclubs and retail outlets. Our Leadership Team Eric Pfeil President/Chief Executive Officer Keith Abatto Chief Operating Officer/Chief Financial Officers Michael Stelluti Vice President Of Supplier Management Michael Lynch Vice President Of Sales Execution Carol G. Brown Executive Director Of Human Resources Sales Division Leadership Joe Benny General Manager, Royal Division Silverio Piccirillo Vice President Of Sales For Upstate New York, Freedom Division Jeff Brooks General Manager, Phoenix Division Eric Pfeil President/Chief Executive Officer Eric is a graduate of the University of Michigan, with a degree in Business Economics and was formerly the Executive Vice President of Breakthru Beverage of Florida. His responsibilities included overseeing all sales, sales execution, finance, pricing & programming, supplier relations, retail & on-premise chains, operations, human resources, events and data analytics. During his 16-year tenure at Premier Beverage, now Breakthru Beverage, Eric held multiple leadership positions, including General Sales Manager for South Florida, and Vice President of Sales. Eric’s career in the wine and spirits industry spans many years including prior management roles both domestically and internationally. At the E & J Gallo Winery, he was a Regional Manager in Texas, managing all sales and chain activity for Texas, Louisiana, Arkansas and Oklahoma. From there, he moved to Tokyo, Japan to be the Sales Director for E&J Gallo Japan, where he managed over a million cases of Gallo in both the chains and the local independents. In Japan, Eric managed a Japanese sales team of over 100 sales reps and managers, as well as over 40 wholesalers nationwide. His industry experience also includes his work as General Manager of Johnson Brothers Liquor Company Tampa, Florida managing over 2 million cases of Gallo, as well as his work as Vice President of Republic Beverage‘s Texas Wine Company, where he started an organization that included the first statewide chain team, statewide pricing and programming and managing all the Republic/Block/Schepps Suppliers on a statewide basis. Keith Abatto Chief Operating Officer/Chief Financial Officers Keith Abatto is the Chief Operating Officer/Chief Financial Officer at Empire Merchants North, overseeing all Operations, Finance, Compliance, Information Technology, Purchasing and Customer Service functions. Keith brings nearly 30 years of experience from his time in Public Accounting, and Private Industry as a Controller, Vice President of Operations and Chief Financial Officer for a variety of notable companies. Keith started at a Public Accounting firm in Albany before moving to KPMG, a leader in the Accounting field. He then spent 15 years rising to Vice President of Operations at Environment One Corporation in Niskayuna, a subsidiary of Precision Castparts Corporation, a Fortune 100 Company acquired by Berkshire Hathaway. Keith moved from there to Horizon Bradco in Schenectady, a Private Equity backed Company owned by Hamilton Robinson Capital Partners. After four years there, he took on the role of Chief Financial Officer for Death Wish Coffee Company in Ballston Spa, New York. Keith is a graduate of Siena College, holding a BA in Accounting, a Certified Public Accountant and is a member of the NYSSCPA’s and AICPA. Michael Stelluti Vice President Of Supplier Management Mike Stelluti started his career in the wine and spirits industry in 1982 as a Sales Representative for Colony Liquor Distributors. During his 14-year career there, Mike held various positions including Sales Representative, Field Sales Manager and Division Manager for the Westchester and New York City markets. After Colony’s 1996 merger with Peerless Importers, he became the Division Manager for the newly formed Regent (Diageo) Division overseeing the lower Hudson Valley. In 1998 Mike took on the role of Fine Wine Director, managing and overseeing the Fine Wine portfolio for Colony Liquor Distributors. Following the merger of Colony and Charmer Industries in 2006, Mike was named Director of Wine overseeing all wine suppliers as well as directing the Fine Wine Team. In 2012, he became the Director of Business Management overseeing the business development of all Empire Merchants North wine and spirit suppliers. In 2018, Mike was appointed as Vice President of Wine and Craft Spirit sales, responsible for overseeing the management and development of Empire Merchants North’s Wine and Craft Spirit portfolio. In June of 2020 Mike was promoted to Vice President of Supplier Management where he currently oversees all supplier logistics and relationships as well as analytics, marketing, and social media. Mike obtained a B.S. in Business Administration with a concentration in Marketing from Mercy College in Dobbs Ferry, New York. Michael Lynch Vice President Of Sales Execution Michael Lynch is the Vice President of Sales Execution of Empire Merchants North. Mike is a 16-year industry veteran, starting his career as a Schieffelin & Somerset account development specialist for Service-Universal Distributors. He spent nine years at Service-Universal in several roles, most recently as the Vice President of Sales and Marketing for the East. Mike became the General Sales Manager for the Majestic Division in September of 2007, when Service-Universal and Colony Liquor & Wines consolidated. In 2009, Mike became the General Manager of the Alliance suppliers, and subsequently led the development of the dedicated Alliance Division for Brown-Forman, Bacardi and Rémy Contreau. Mike graduated from Empire State College, State University of New York, with a Bachelor of Science degree in business management. Carol G. Brown Executive Director Of Human Resources Carol G. Brown is the Executive Director of Human Resources at Empire Merchants North. Carol joined Service-Universal Distributors in January 1983 as the Office Manager, overseeing the Syracuse operations. In 1998, she was promoted to the role of Director of Human Resources for Service-Universal Distributors. With the merger of Colony Liquor & Wine Distributors and Service-Universal Distributors, Carol became the Executive Director of Human Resources, responsible for the design and implementation of all Human Resources strategies, policies and processes throughout the company. In addition to her involvement with Human Resources, Carol also oversees all safety-related functions for Empire Merchants North. Carol received a Bachelor of Arts degree in business administration from Lycoming College. Joe Benny General Manager, Royal Division Joe Benny began his career working his way through college and graduate school in the restaurant business, where he held various management roles. He joined Wine Merchants in 2004 as an on-premise Sales Representative. Joe was promoted to on-premise Brand Manager for the E&J Gallo portfolio at Colony Liquor & Wine. In June 2008, Joe joined the E&J Gallo Winery as State Manager, on premise, for Massachusetts. In October 2011, he was promoted again to State Manager, retail, for New Jersey, and soon after to Area Manager for the Fine Wine portfolio. In July 2013, he was made the Director of Fine Wine Retail for the Midwest Region and relocated to Chicago. In January 2014, he returned to Upstate New York to become the General Manager of the Royal Division at Empire Merchants North. He is a graduate of Siena College and holds an MBA from the State University of New York at Albany. Silverio Piccirillo Vice President Of Sales For Upstate New York, Freedom Division Silverio Piccirillo launched his career in the wine and spirits industry in 2004 at Eber Bros./NDC/Paramount Brands as a salesperson. In 2007, he became a District Sales Manager for Constellation Brands in the Icon Wine Estates Division. He joined the Empire Merchants family in 2008 as a Field Sales Manager in the Atlantic Off Premise Wine Division and was later promoted to Business Manager for the Diageo Chateau & Estates portfolio in 2011. In 2014, Silverio became the New York State Regional Director for Treasury Wine Estates before transitioning to a MNY Business Manager role for key wine suppliers at Empire Merchants in 2015. His extensive wine experience led him to become the United Division Off Premise Wine Director of Sales for the country’s first exclusive Off Premise Moët Hennessy Wine Division in 2016. In 2020, Silverio was appointed as the New York State Director of Champagne and Wine for the Moët Hennessy portfolio. In June 2022 Silverio was promoted to Vice President UNY for the Freedom Division where he is currently responsible for leading our UNY team and driving exceptional results for the Moët Hennessy portfolio. Jeff Brooks General Manager, Phoenix Division Jeff Brooks is the General Manager of the Phoenix Division at Empire Merchants North. He was born and raised in Western New York. Jeff spent eighteen years in the service industry prior to joining Service Universal. Jeff joined Service Universal sixteen years ago and has been with Empire Merchants North since the merger. Jeff started as an Account Development Specialist for four years and was then promoted to the ADS’ manager for four years. In 2012 he was appointed to the Director of Sales for the West for the Phoenix Division. He was named the General Manager of the Phoenix Division in 2020. About | Empire Lounge & Liquor Home About R&B Sunday Brunch Gallery Events Contact OUR STORY EMPIRE LOUNGE & LIQUOR Empire Lounge & Liquors – the epitome of urban sophistication and indulgence in West Palm Beach. Step into an enchanting world where luxury meets cutting-edge entertainment, all set in a spacious and inviting environment. Discover the ultimate VIP experience with our multiple exclusive VIP areas, each exquisitely designed to provide an intimate and personalized setting for you and your esteemed guests. Immerse yourself in the allure of Empire Lounge & Liquors as our dedicated team caters to your every desire, ensuring your night is nothing short of extraordinary. For the sports enthusiasts, our 6800 square foot venue boasts nine stacked 65" screens, offering an unparalleled sports viewing experience that keeps you at the heart of the action while you unwind with your favorite libation. Cheer for your teams in style and revel in the electric energy that permeates the lounge during game nights. Empire Lounge & Liquors was developed with a clear vision – to craft an atmosphere where time slows down, allowing our patrons to savor every moment. We set out to create an environment where friends and colleagues can come together to enjoy quality time and  top tier entertainment in a relaxed and sophisticated setting. OUR STORY Meet the dynamic power couple behind Empire Lounge & Liquors – Bull and Shernett. Hailing from Jamaica, their journey is a testament to hard work, determination, and a shared vision to create something extraordinary. What began as a single restaurant venture has now blossomed into an empire they proudly call their own. Their unwavering dedication and commitment to excellence paid off when they became the owners of the entire plaza, taking charge of the spaces surrounding their restaurant. This allowed them to expand their vision and give birth to Empire Lounge & Liquors – a captivating urban haven that exudes elegance and allure. HOURS: Tuesday - 6 pm to 2 am Wednesday - 6 pm to 1 am Thursday - 6 pm to 3 am Friday - 8 pm to 3 am Saturday - 8 pm to 3 am Sunday - 6 pm to midnight CONTACT US: 561- 331-8643 3111 45th St Ste 14 & 15, West Palm Beach, FL 33407 © 2025 Empire Lounge & Liquor Bar Powered by b.Digital Consulting

Home | Empire Lounge & Liquor Home About R&B Sunday Brunch Gallery Events Contact EMPIRE LOUNGE URBAN  MEETS CHIC IN THE HEART OF WEST PALM BEACH CLICK HERE TO RESERVE YOUR SUNDAY BRUNCH SPOTS ONLINE RESERVATIONS CLOSE AT 4 PM EACH SATURDAY Welcome to Empire Lounge and Liquors West Palm Beach's Premier Urban Lounge for the Grown, Mature, and Sexy Crowd! At Empire Lounge and Liquors, we invite you to step into an alluring haven where sophistication meets urban charm. Our meticulously designed space in the heart of West Palm Beach sets the stage for an unforgettable night out like no other. Elevate Your Nights at Empire Lounge and Liquors: Where Urban Sophistication Meets Mature Allure! Exquisite Libations: Indulge in the company of like-minded individuals who appreciate the finer things in life. Our talented mixologists craft an array of curated cocktails and offer a selection of premium spirits to tantalize your taste buds and elevate your spirits. Unforgettable Entertainment: Prepare to be captivated and enthralled by our carefully curated lineup of entertainment. From soulful live performances to the latest beats spun by renowned DJs, each night at Empire Lounge and Liquors promises to be an unforgettable celebration of music and dance. CHECK OUT MORE! Join us for an evening of sophisticated revelry at Empire Lounge and Liquors, where connections are forged, and memories are made. Prepare to immerse yourself in an experience that ignites your senses and leaves you yearning for more. Unwind, socialize, and savor the moments that matter at Empire Lounge and Liquors – the epitome of refined urban nightlife for the mature and sexy crowd. Your journey into elegance begins here. Sophistication Meets Urban Charm Experience an ambiance that transcends expectations with contemporary aesthetics and a touch of urban allure. Empire Lounge and Liquors is thoughtfully curated to cater to the refined tastes of the discerning crowd, offering an upscale and elegant experience. Indulge in Urban Excellence Mingle & Connect Whether you prefer a moment of solitude at our intimate bar or wish to mingle with fellow sophisticates, Empire Lounge offers the perfect setting. Engage in conversations that spark intellect and excitement, surrounded by an electric energy that sets the mood for the night. Ageless Elegance: At Empire Lounge and Liquors, we believe style and class know no age limits. We welcome all who embody the spirit of grown maturity and allure, creating an inclusive and vibrant atmosphere for everyone to enjoy. Top 5 Reasons You Must Treat Yourselves to the Empire Lounge Experience Sophisticated Ambiance: Empire Lounge exudes an air of sophistication and refinement, making it the perfect destination for those seeking an upscale and elegant nightlife experience. From the stylish decor to the carefully curated atmosphere, every detail is designed to transport you into a world of class and allure. Themed Event Nights: Get ready for an exhilarating lineup of themed event nights that cater to diverse tastes and moods. Whether you're a fan of Karaoke and Games, crave the best tacos on Taco Tuesdays, or want to immerse yourself in the island vibes of Club Reggae, Empire Lounge offers a range of exciting nights to keep you entertained all week long. VIP Treatment: Elevate your nights with the exclusive VIP areas, where you and your guests can enjoy a personalized and intimate setting, complete with dedicated service and attention to detail. Feel like a star as our attentive team caters to your every desire, making your experience at Empire Lounge truly exceptional. State-of-the-Art Entertainment: Experience entertainment like never before with nine stacked 65" screens for an immersive sports viewing experience, while live performances, renowned DJs, and music that transcends time keep the energy alive throughout the night. Warm Hospitality: Meet the passionate owners, Bull and Shernett, who have tirelessly worked to create a welcoming and inviting atmosphere for all guests. Their dedication and genuine hospitality ensure that each visit to Empire Lounge is a memorable experience. Embark on an unparalleled nightlife experience at Empire Lounge and Liquors, where we offer more than just exceptional entertainment. Elevate your nights with our exclusive access to additional privacy and coveted bottle services. Indulge in the luxury of reserving a private space for you and your companions, immersing yourselves in an intimate ambiance that's tailor-made for memorable moments. Our highly sought-after bottle services ensure that your libations are served with unrivaled attention to detail, allowing you to savor every sip of our carefully curated cocktails and premium spirits. Don't miss this opportunity to enjoy an elevated and refined evening that caters to your desires for both privacy and exceptional service. While we create an inviting and familiar atmosphere that welcomes our guests, we also love to spice things up with an array of special events. Whether it's themed parties, live performances by renowned artists, or exclusive collaborations with top DJs, we always keep our nights fresh, exciting, and full of surprises. What's Happening PLAN YOUR NEXT EVENT WITH US At Empire Lounge & Liquors, you can be sure that bespoke party experiences come to life. Our expert specialists meticulously curate personalized party packages tailored to your preferences. From exquisite cocktails to themed decor and entertainment, every detail is carefully crafted to exceed your expectations. At Empire Lounge, we ensure your celebration is an extraordinary and cherished affair, creating memories that last a lifetime. Empire is an Equal Opportunity Employer and Drug Free Workplace. Contact Us X Portals For Customers For Teammates ADP Diver Sharepoint For Suppliers Diver Sharepoint Portal Brands Locations Georgia North Carolina Tennessee Colorado About Us Blog Careers Brands Locations Georgia North Carolina Tennessee Colorado About Us Blog Careers Contact Us For Customers For Teammates ADP Diver Sharepoint For Suppliers Diver Sharepoint Portal Our Story We’ve always been glass half-full kind of people That’s why from our very beginning, we’ve filled each day with passion and enthusiasm for this industry. Our philosophy is based on the simple mission of being the very best at Building Brands and Developing People. Our brands and our Teammates are the backbone of Empire, and we strive to get better every day. The family business Empire is now in its third generation of family leadership. But David and Michael Kahn, today’s company leaders, have something their grandfather and founder, Max Kahn, never had – the backing and resources of Berkshire Hathaway. Berkshire Hathaway’s acquisition of EDI in 2010 fueled investment that enabled us to grow rapidly while constantly investing in our distribution facilities, fleet, technology and people so we can offer our brands every advantage possible. 80 Years of Empire 1940 Max Kahn starts Empire with two trucks and a single warehouse in Atlanta, GA. 1942 Max leaves his flourishing business in the hands of associates to fight in WWII. 1984 Empire expands into North Carolina via acquisitions of multiple distributors. 2010 Warren Buffet and Berkshire Hathaway entered an agreement with Kahn Ventures making Empire and Empire NC subsidiaries of Berkshire and its distribution company, McLane Company. 2010 Empire expands into Tennessee via acquisition of Horizon Wine & Spirits. 2012 Empire continues its expansion into Tennessee with the acquisiton of Delta Wholesale Liquors (Memphis, TN). 2013 Empire North Carolina expands into Winston Salem and Greensboro markets with the acquisition of Wisdom Beverage to become a statewide, full-service beverage distributor covering all 100 counties in NC. 2014 The company takes a giant leap westward to serve Colorado via an acquisiton of Baroness Small Estates. 2017 Empire makes its third acquisition, B&T Distributing Company in Knoxville, Tennessee, to become the largest, statewide spirits and wine wholesaler in Tennessee. Empire consolidates all of the acquired companies into Empire Distributors of Tennessee, Inc. 2017 Empire acquires Volio Vino, Inc., a fine wine wholesaler in Denver, CO. In conjunction with Baroness Small Estates, Empire Distributors of Colorado, Inc. forms, becoming one of the top five distributors in the state. 2019 Empire invests in a new 602,000 sq. ft. state of the art facility to house their Georgia logistical operations and corporate headquarters in Austell, Georgia. Executive Leadership at Empire David Kahn President & CEO Read Bio David Kahn President & CEO David was born and raised in Atlanta and started working for Empire at a young age. He earned his bachelor’s degree from Southern Methodist University and his MBA from Emory University in Atlanta. Before joining Empire, he worked at Wachovia Bank for three years as a loan officer. In his time at Empire before becoming President of the GA operation in 1994, he worked in operations, customer service, marketing and sales. In 1998, David and his brother Michael purchased the company and devised a strategy to grow into other markets. Outside of the business, David has served on the boards of the Atlanta Speech School, The Lovett School, Shepherd Center and Fernbank Museum. David and his wife Jennifer are proud parents of three sons and two Labrador retrievers. Outside of work, David enjoys saltwater fishing, watching football, Braves games and playing golf. Jim Schwarzkopf EVP, CFO Read Bio Jim Schwarzkopf EVP, CFO Jim was born and raised in Des Moines, Iowa, and earned an undergraduate degree in Accounting from the University of Northern Iowa. He moved to Atlanta in 1982 and joined Empire in 1986. He has been active in the Atlanta community, serving as Treasurer on the boards for the Center for Puppetry Arts and Ansley Golf Club. Jim and his wife are the proud parents of three daughters. His other interests include golf, tennis, skeet shooting, hunting and cycling. Gary Wolfe VP, COO Read Bio Gary Wolfe VP, COO Prior to his time with the Kahn Ventures network of distributors, Gary worked with E&J Gallo Winery for 10 years and Johnson Brothers for 3 years. Since joining Empire, he has held several positions and been responsible for handling the budgeting process for the sales divisions, brand development and supplier relationships. Gary earned a bachelor’s degree from Auburn University. In addition to spending time with his wife and two sons, he is a member of the executive committee for WSWT and current President of the WSWG (’20-’21). Gary’s interests include hiking, skiing, hunting and golf. Bill MacPhail VP, CIO Read Bio Bill MacPhail VP, CIO Bill has over thirty years of experience in the IT field specializing in product and software development. He holds Master of Science degrees in Computer Science from Mississippi State University and Management of Technology from Georgia Institute of Technology. Bill was responsible for completing our SAP implementation, created a sales order entry strategy to replace an aging PC client system, and developed a network strategy that improved stability, secondary and tertiary backup while boosting network speed by 10 to 20 times. Chanika Vinson VP, Finance Read Bio Chanika Vinson VP, Finance Chanika is originally from Detroit, Michigan. She earned a Masters of Accounting from Georgia State University in Atlanta before becoming a CPA. Chanika then gained 10 years of experience in auditing in public accounting before joining Empire. Outside of work, she volunteers with the Make A Wish Foundation and is the proud parent of a toddler. Gregory Clarke VP, Special Projects Read Bio Gregory Clarke VP, Special Projects During his 27 years in the spirits, wine and beer industry, Greg has had numerous roles and responsibilities managing sales, operations, purchasing, administration, finance and technology. Prior to the merger with Empire Distributors, he was the COO of Horizon Wine and Spirits. Before starting his career, he attended Worcester Polytechnic Institute and Worcester State College. Greg is married with three children and enjoy spending time with family, traveling, playing golf and hiking. He also volunteers for local youth and children’s charities and has coached youth sports for 15 years. Michael Kahn SVP Read Bio Michael Kahn SVP Michael’s grandfather founded Empire Distributors in Atlanta, GA, circa 1940. Michael began working in the warehouse and delivery as he worked his way through school. Michael attended both the University of Georgia and Kennesaw State College. After working for three years at Republic Land & Investment Co., he joined the family business in 1984. Working in sales and sales management Michael made the move to Charlotte, NC, in 1988 when Empire expanded in to the Carolinas and has made that his home since. He lives with his wife Wendy, two teenage boys and several dogs. Michael is an avid UGA Football fan, along with enjoying golf and fishing. Wendy Parker Attorney Read Bio Wendy Parker Attorney As our Attorney, Wendy is our primary strategic legal advisor on transactional and operational matters.  Wendy received her J.D. from the University of South Carolina School of Law and previously worked in private practice in Charleston, SC.  Wendy volunteers with the First Tee of Greater Austin and with the Carolina Youth Development Center, including serving as Chair from 2007-9. Wendy Lewis VP, Marketing & Communications Read Bio Wendy Lewis VP, Marketing & Communications Wendy Lewis, a native of Baton Rouge, LA, has more than two decades of marketing and public relations experience at high-growth entrepreneurial CPG and fashion companies. She joined Empire in 2020 to focus on expanding the company’s marketing and communications strategy across the network as well as develop digital, social and e-commerce programs. Wendy holds an MBA in Marketing from Georgia State University and a Bachelor’s Degree in Mass Communication from Louisiana State University. When she’s not busy chasing after her four children and rescue pup, she enjoys riding her Peloton and volunteering with Children’s Healthcare of Atlanta. Eric Crane Director of Training Business Development Read Bio Eric Crane Director of Training Business Development Eric S. Crane, a Georgia native, joined Empire in 2002. He held many roles at Empire before taking over the Training Department in 2007. He has achieved the title of Certified Wine Educator from the Society of Wine Educators and the title of Advanced Sommelier from the Court of Master Sommeliers. Eric also serves on the Board of Directors for SommSouth, a nonprofit dedicated to assisting Wine Professionals throughout the South Eastern United States. In his spare time Eric hangs out with his family and dogs, enjoys live music, cooks, and learns about things to drink. Shane Wilson Corporate Director of Operations Read Bio Shane Wilson Corporate Director of Operations Shane Wilson, is a native of Arlington, Texas and has called Georgia home since 1996. He has over 20 years of distribution and safety experience with Mohawk Industries and now Empire. He joined Empire in 2013 as our Safety and Fleet Compliance Manager and then as our Director of Operations for Atlanta in 2017. Shane has been married to his wife Stacy since 2010 and has three children, with one on the way in December 2021. He enjoys spending time with his family at soccer, golf and basketball and is a big Atlanta Braves and Georgia Bulldogs fan. Karen Davis Corporate Director, Teammate Resources Read Bio Karen Davis Corporate Director, Teammate Resources Karen L. Davis has 30 years of Human Resources experience, originally joining the Empire Team in July 2004 as HR Manager and Health and Welfare Benefits Manager was added to her role in 2006. After company and department growth, in 2016 she moved into the role of Corporate Benefits, HRIS and HR Compliance Manager and was promoted to Corporate Teammate Resources Director at the start of 2025. Karen was born and raised in Atlanta, Georgia and spends her time volunteering on several committees at Tri-Cities Church and focusing daily on her health and wellness journey. Brian Bennett Corporate Director, Purchasing Read Bio Brian Bennett Corporate Director, Purchasing Brian Bennett joined the U.S. Navy and was stationed in Florida before starting a civilian career in Supply Chain/Distribution management that has spanned over 25 years in Florida and the Carolinas. After working in the contractor trade industries for many years, he joined Empire in late 2021 as the North Carolina State Purchasing Manager and now serves as the Corporate Director of Purchasing. Although Brian is a fan of most sports, he has acquired a new love for hiking and exploring new activities. David Henry Business Development Manager Read Bio David Henry Business Development Manager Upon completion of college, David started his career in this industry with B and G Wholesale, Nashville, TN. During the next four years with B and G Wholesale, David worked in each sales division and concluded by running the Gallo division. David left B and G Wholesale for a short period to work for a supplier. He quickly realized that his true passion was to be involved in the wholesale realm of our industry. David moved to Lexington, KY, to manage Bryant Distributing and then moved to Nashville, TN, and became the Director of Sales at Lipman Brothers. David finished his time with Lipman Brothers as the Vice President of Sales. From Lipman, David became the Vice President and General Manager of B and T Distributing in Knoxville, TN. David eventually became the President/Partner of B & T where he significantly grew the company’s presence in Eastern TN. In 2016, David joined the Empire team when Empire purchased B and T Distributing and was promoted to Business Development Manager in 2025. Succeeding Responsibly Everyone on the Empire team is committed to supporting and improving the communities, businesses and people we serve. Learn More Making a positive impact Empire approaches our corporate social responsibility as a labor of love. We’re deeply committed and actively involved in uplifting the well-being of our Teammates, Communities and Business Partners because we enjoy making a difference. That’s why we’re a proud supporter of the Foundation for Advancing Alcohol Responsibility. Learn More Full Service Printing One more way we go the extra mile for our customers is with our in-house professional printing capabilities. Learn More Customizable Promo Materials We understand that our customers and brands benefit from professional, high-quality sales and promotional materials. So, we created an in-house print facility to provide a wide range of items, including: Wine Lists & Menus Table Tents Window Clings Promotional Signs Bottle Neckers Die Cut Stickers Shelf-talkers/Shelf-pricers Contact your Empire Representative for full details on what’s available in your area and to place your order. Contact Us Sample our service Reach out with any questions you may have to see just how responsive, knowledgeable and downright friendly an Empire Representative can be.
